tool_description: Get complete list of all economic events. Filter by countries & dates.

api_list.name: Events
api_list.description: Retrieve all economic events, with the ability to filter by country symbols (e.g., US, JP, GB) and by date range.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: End date for filtering events in YYYY-MM-DD format.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Start date for filtering events in YYYY-MM-DD format.

optional_parameters.name: countries
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of country symbols to filter events (e.g., US,GB).
